ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s the battle you’ve been waiting for! No, not G.I. Joe versus Cobra… it’s Snake Eyes versus Quick Kick! When Snake Eyes steps out of bounds, only Quick Kick stands in the way of the ninja commando. Who is the team’s true martial arts champion? Well, you’ve gotta read to find out!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Aaron Conley (a) & Jean-Francois Beaulieu (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Giannis Milonogiannis | 2 | C | Cover C | Tom Whalen | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Santipérez (a) & David Garcia Cruz (c) | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-10 12:26:32. [CVDB617487]
ComicInfo.Colorist: David Garcia Cruz, Jean-Francois Beaulieu, Lovern Kindzierski
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Aaron Conley, David Garcia Cruz, Giannis Milonogiannis, Jean-Francois Beaulieu, Santipérez, Tom Whalen
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Helix, Baroness, Crystal Ball, Doc, Duke, Quick-Kick, Roadblock, Rock & Roll, Scarlett, Skywarp, Snake Eyes, Spirit, Tunnel Rat, Zandar, Zarana
